General.Name: TPV Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: TPV Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and distributes display products in China and internationally. It offers monitors, professional TVs, digital signages, videowalls, and LED displays; wireless speakers; soundbars; headphones; wireless headphones, and mobile phones. The company offers its display products under the AOC, AGON, Envision, and Philips brands. It also provides smart and tailored professional display solutions to businesses in various industries, such as corporate, hospitality, education, transportation, retail, healthcare, public venues, and more. The company was formerly known as Nanjing Huadong Electronics Information & Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to TPV Technology Co., Ltd. in May 2021. The company was founded in 1967 and is based in Nanjing, China. TPV Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Electronics Corporation.
